=== Royal family ===

Members of the British royal family are granted their own personal arms which are based on the royal arms. Only children and grandchildren in the male line of the monarch are entitled to arms in this fashion: the arms of children of the monarch are differenced with a three-point label; grandchildren of the monarch are differenced with a five-point label. An exception is made for the eldest son of the Prince of Wales
column2: who bears a three-point label. Since 1911
column3: the arms of the Prince of Wales also displays an inescutcheon of the ancient arms of the Principality of Wales.
